subtitle.line1: AI handles first contact to CRM handoff.
subtitle.line2: Focus on growth and closing, not chasing.

results.title: And what you get
results.subtitle: From chaos to certainty in 30 days

upfrontCost.title: Initial Cost
upfrontCost.mission: We solve problems not create them

gdpr.title: GDPR & CCPA Compliant
gdpr.description: All workflows respect opt-out preferences, unsubscribe links, and data residency requirements. We're fully compliant with global privacy standards.

brand.title: Brand Protection
brand.description: Real-time monitoring ensures every interaction stays on-topic, professional, and perfectly aligned with your brand's voice and guidelines.

bottomCta.title: See AI Work, Not Just Talk.
bottomCta.quote: If a picture is worth a thousand words, a live demo is worth a thousand pictures.
bottomCta.description: Before you do anything else, experience how AI handles real conversations as if it were your own business agent, programmed specifically for your niche. In just a few minutes, you'll see it respond naturally to your customers while taking care of the repetitive work your team shouldn't have to do.
